name: Christmas Box Shooter
description:
It's the fast-paced Christmas Box Shooter - Target Smash Fun Game where you feel the time pressure you can't even imagine!

It's all about absorbing pressure & shoot time, so be quick, fast and focus on game-play!

Use your cross-hair to shoot the Boxes and get points before the clock strikes!

Don't Hit the wrong Box or it will cost you some time loss!

Hit the Bonus Boxes to get extra time!

An ultimate fun game for kids, boys, and girls.

Christmas Box Shooter - Target Smash Fun Game is designed for babies, kids, & toddlers.

FEATURES:
- Challenging GamePlay
- Addictive Time of Play
- Interesting Fun
- HD Graphics
- Smooth Gameplay
- Attractive GUI
